entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Terrace Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Bay 02:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: S 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
